title: Generation Earth 1080p x264 [AClass]
description:
Generation Earth is the story of our manmade world



In the last generation, we have changed the face of the Earth on a scale unimaginable to our ancestors. Generation Earth discovers how 

villages in China have been transformed into cities of millions, the tallest building in the world dwarfs the skyscrapers of America, and we 

have built a dam so big that it has changed the rotation of the planet.


Part One: A Place to Live

The story of our manmade world In the last generation, we have changed the face of the Earth on a scale unimaginable to our ancestors. 

Villages in China have been transformed into cities of millions, the tallest building in the world dwarfs the skyscrapers of America, and we 

have built a dam so big that it has changed the rotation of the planet.

Part Two: The Way We Move

Look at how, in the last generation, we have changed the face of the Earth on a scale unimaginable to our ancestors. Villages in China have 

been transformed into cities of millions, the tallest building in the world dwarfs the skyscrapers of America, and we have built a dam so big 

that it has changed the rotation of the planet.

Part Three: Food, Fire and Water

As the world population continues to grow, vital necessities such as food, water, and energy are becoming increasingly difficult to supply. 

Modern-day engineering feats like to Hoover Dam and large greenhouses attempt to satisfy the demands on these important resources
